item.title: 3D Gorillas
item.description: 3D Gorillas is a game developed by myself as part of my 3rd year dissertation project at the University of Hull. QBasic Gorillas is a 2D artillery game developed in 1992 by IBM corporation, and now we have the unofficial remake - 3D Gorillas, developed in Unity Engine by Sam Chestney in 2019! :)

item.title: Quadrant
item.description:
Introduction

Quadrant is the first game development project during my time studying Games Development at the University of Hull.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my first post. Stick around a bit, there’s lots more to come.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Sam - a computer science student hoping to some day help provide gamers with unforgettable gaming experiences similar to the ones I’ve had over my years of gaming. My history I was introduced into the world of writing code back in secondary school. An email was passed around my year group offering a select number of students to be introduced onto a ‘Computing’ module rather than the standard ‘ICT’ module which all other students sat.
